comment.author: 40878011@N07
comment._content: There is a history of the building, which was built as a covered market with the museum on the upper floor, here: www.dover-kent.co.uk/places/market_hall.htm .

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
sps1955: Thanks a lot for posting the link to this interesting page about the building. I've added some information to our database. 
/Anna B.
